PaymentMethod.saveAccountPaymentMethodEncryptFlag_hint: Seleting this option will store the secure payment info in an encrypted format when saving an Account Payment Method.  It is not recommended, as other options like generating tokens are typically better.
PaymentMethod.saveOrderPaymentEncryptFlag_hint: Seleting this option will store the secure payment info in an encrypted format when saving an Order Payment.  It is not recommended, as other options like generating tokens are typically better.

AVSDescription.A: Street address matches, but 5-digit and 9-digit postal code do not match.
AVSDescription.B: Street address matches, but postal code not verified.
AVSDescription.C: Street address and postal code do not match.
AVSDescription.D: Street address and postal code match. Code "M" is equivalent.
AVSDescription.E: AVS data is invalid or AVS is not allowed for this card type.
AVSDescription.F: Card member's name does not match, but billing postal code matches.
AVSDescription.G: Non-U.S. issuing bank does not support AVS.
AVSDescription.H: Card member's name does not match. Street address and postal code match.
AVSDescription.J: Card member's name, billing address, and postal code match.
AVSDescription.K: Card member's name matches but billing address and billing postal code do not match.
AVSDescription.L: Card member's name and billing postal code match, but billing address does not match.
AVSDescription.M: Street address and postal code match. Code "D" is equivalent.
AVSDescription.N: Street address and postal code do not match.
AVSDescription.O: Card member's name and billing address match, but billing postal code does not match.
AVSDescription.P: Postal code matches, but street address not verified.
AVSDescription.Q: Card member's name, billing address, and postal code match.
AVSDescription.T: Card member's name does not match, but street address matches.
AVSDescription.U: Address information unavailable. Returned if the U.S. bank does not support non-U.S. AVS or if the AVS in a U.S. bank is not functioning properly.
AVSDescription.V: Card member's name, billing address, and billing postal code match.
AVSDescription.W: Street address does not match, but 9-digit postal code matches.
AVSDescription.X: Street address and 9-digit postal code match.
AVSDescription.Y: Street address and 5-digit postal code match.
AVSDescription.Z: Street address does not match, but 5-digit postal code matches.

process.updateDefaultImageFileNames_confirm: Are you sure that you want to override the default image filename?  Doing this may remove your existing default images.

PromotionQualifier.rewardMatchingType_hint: This allows you to specify how the item rewards are matched with this qualifier.  Such as 'only apply rewards to items that match the same x as this qualifier'

PromotionReward.maximumUsePerItem_hint: This defines the maximum number of times that this reward can be applied to an item in the cart with multiple quantities.
PromotionReward.maximumUsePerOrder_hint: This defines the maximum number of times that this reward can be applied to an order.
PromotionReward.maximumUsePerQualification_hint: This setting is mostly used in defining things like buy one get one free where you would qualify by having a quantity of 2 of an item, and then this would be set to 1 with 100% discount.  If there are no qualifiers than this setting is never used.

Schedule.frequencyEndTime_hint: Defining this will allow for the schedule to run multiple times in a given day.
Schedule.frequencyInterval_hint: Between the Start Time & End Time of any given day, this schedule will run every interval of minutes defined.
Schedule.frequencyStartTime_hint: Defines the time of day that you would like the schedule to start.  If no end time is defined, then this is just the 1 time during the day where the schedule will run.

ShippingMethodRate.defaultAmount_hint: When using a 'manual' rate this is the amount that will be charged.  If you are using a shipping provider, then this value is the fallback amount if for some reason the shipping provider is inaccessible.

Sku.exclusive: Image is exclusive for this sku

paymentMethod.placeOrderChargeTransactionType_hint: This type of transaction will be run for all 'charge' order payments when the order is placed.
paymentMethod.placeOrderCreditTransactionType_hint: This type of transaction will be run for all 'credit' order payments when the order is placed.
paymentMethod.saveAccountPaymentMethodTransactionType_: Typically used to generate 'tokens' from the processor, which are then stored with the 'Account Payment Method' to avoid encrypting & storing data.
paymentMethod.saveOrderPaymentTransactionType_hint: Typically used to generate 'tokens' from the processor, which are then stored with the 'Order Payment' to avoid encrypting & storing data.

paymentmethod.allowSaveFlag_hint: If this is set to yes, then people will be able to save payment methods of this type to their account.

priceGroup.parentPriceGroup_hint: Selecting a Parent Price group to inherit rates from allows you to setup a broad price group and then override / add only the rates that are different.
priceGroup.priceGroupCode_hint: A unique string (alphanumerc, no spaces) to identify the price group.

product.listprice_hint: Optional field to specify an MSRP or a price that this product is usually listed as.  Typically this is to show that you offer the product at a lower rate
product.manufactureDiscontinuedFlag_hint: Has this product been discontinued by the manufacturer?
product.price_hint: The everyday price at which this product will be sold on your site (do not appy sales/promotions here).
product.productCode_hint: A unique string (alphanumeric, no spaces) to identify the product.

product.publishedFlag_hint: Item is available and visible on the front-end (both 'Active' and 'Published' must be selected to display on the front-end)
product.shippingWeight_hint: Weight (in lbs) to be used to calculate shipping charges.

roundingRule.roundingRuleExpression_hint: This sting allows you to define how you would like to round a value.  For example to round to the nearest .49 or .99 this would be your rounding ule expression\: .49,.99

shippingMethod.delete_validateIsDeletable: This shipping method cannot be deleted because it has been used in an order.

subscriptionTerm.allowProrateFlag_hint: Selecting this options will allow for subscriptions to be pro-rated based on a schedule
subscriptionTerm.autoPayFlag_hint: If this is set to 'Yes' then when a renewal order is created, it will automatically use the payment method on file to renew the order
subscriptionTerm.autoRenewFlag_hint: If this is set to 'Yes' then a renewal order will be automatically created at the end of the subscription term
subscriptionTerm.billedOnDayOfMonth_hint: This value is used in conjunction with the pro-rate option
subscriptionTerm.gracePeriodTerm_hint: If an auto-renewed subscription is unpaid for some reason, then this grace period will provide the duration that someone can continue to use services until their account is suspended
subscriptionTerm.initialTerm_hint: This defines the duration of the first term for a given subscription.
subscriptionTerm.renewalTerm_hint: This defines the duration of all the subsequent auto-renew terms after the initial term.

vendor.vendorWebsite_hint: Die Website des Lieferanten muss mit http\:// oder https\:// beginnen

unexpected.checklog: There was an unexpected error processing your request.  Check the Slatwall Log for details.

Order_AddOrderPayment.saveAccountPaymentMethodFlag_hint: Selecting yes will save this payment method against the account for future orders.

account_create.createAuthenticationFlag_hint: Selecting yes will allow you to save a password for this account so that it can be accessed later

setting.accountAuthenticationAutoLogoutTimespan_: This should be a comman seperated list of numbers that specifies\: days, hours, minutes, seconds.  For example if you want to auto-logout after two hours the value should be\: 0,2,0,0
setting.accountEligiblePaymentMethods_hint: This should be a list of all the available payment methods an account can utilize on their orders.
setting.accountEligiblePaymentTerms_hint: This should be a list of all the available payment terms an account can utilize on a given order.
setting.accountPaymentTerm_hint: This is the default term that will be applied to an accounts order when it is placed
setting.accountTermCreditLimit_hint: This value represents the maximum amount of open unpaid term payments that are allowed for a given account.
setting.brandDisplayTemplate_hint: The content object that you would like to use as the template for displaying product on the front-end.  Typically this is a page in your CMS or Custom Application
setting.contentIncludeChildContentProductsFlag: Include Products from Child Listing Pages
setting.contentIncludeChildContentProductsFlag_h: By selecting this option, and products that are assinged to child listing pages of this listing page will be included in the product list.
setting.contentRequirePurchaseFlag_hint: If this option is selected, then the only way a person will have access to this page is if they have purchased acess via content access product.
setting.contentRequireSubscriptionFlag_hint: If this option is selected, then the only way a person will have access to this page is if they have purchased acess via subscription product.
setting.contentRestrictAccessFlag_hint: By selecting this option the only way this page will be viewed is if the current account has purchased it, or has a subscription to the content.
setting.contentRestrictedContentDisplayTemplate_: When a public user does not have access to this page, they will be redirected to the setting defined here.  You can add more pages to this list by creating content and setting the 'Template Type' to 'Barrier Page'
setting.fulfillmentMethodAutoLocation_hint: This location will be used for an 'auto' fulfillment methods.  It can be overridden in each 'auto' fulfillment method if you create multiple of that type.
setting.fulfillmentMethodAutoMinReceivedPercenta: In order for an auto fulfillment to occur this percentage can be set so that X% of the amount for the items being fulfilled actually be received before fulfillment takes place.  Typically this is set to 0 or 100 saying that you either require or don't require payment to be received before the fulfillment automatically happens
setting.globalOrderPlacedEmailBCC: Blindkopie (BCC) E-Mail Adresse f\u00FCr Neue Bestellung Eingegangen
setting.globalOrderPlacedEmailCC: CC (Kopie) E-Mail Adresse f\u00FCr Neue Bestellung Eingegangen
setting.globalOrderPlacedEmailFrom: Absender E-Mail Adresse f\u00FCr Neue Bestellung Eingegangen
setting.globalOrderPlacedEmailSubjectString: E-Mail Betreffszeile f\u00FCr Neue Bestellung Eingegangen
setting.globalUsageStats_hint: Selecting this option will send your application usage information to the Slatwall development team to help better inform the product.
setting.paymentMethodMaximumOrderTotalPercentage: This setting allows you to define if you would like this particular payment method to only be a portion of the order total amount.  For example on a Term Payment method you may only want 50% of the order total to be used
setting.paymentMethodStoreCreditCardNumberWithAc: Auto Store Credit Card Number With Account
If this is set to yes, then when orders get placed it will automatically create an account payment method, that is setup with the credit card number encrypted and saved
setting.paymentMethodStoreCreditCardNumberWithOr: Auto Store Credit Card Number With Order
If this is set to yes, then when orders get placed it will automatically encrypyt the value of the credit card number and store in the order payment
setting.productAutoApproveReviewsFlag_hint: Selecting this option will automatically setup product reviews to be able to be approved automatically and show up on the front end of the site.
setting.productDisplayTemplate_hint: The content object that you would like to use as the template for displaying product on the front-end.  Typically this is a page in your CMS or Custom Application
setting.productImageOptionCodeDelimiter_hint: Allows for you to define how default product images will be formatted.  Default Product Images start with the productCode, and then any option codes that have been defined as Image Option Groups.  This value is the delimiter that seperates the option codes.
setting.productShowDetailWhenNotPublishedFlag: Display Product Detail When Not Published
setting.productShowDetailWhenNotPublishedFlag_hi: This setting allows you to basically override the default behavior of slatwall by allowing for old product pages to still render after they have been removed from 'published'.
setting.productTypeDisplayTemplate_hint: The content object that you would like to use as the template for displaying product on the front-end.  Typically this is a page in your CMS or Custom Application
setting.siteForgotPasswordEmailTemplate_hint: This setting defines the site based e-mail template that is going to be sent for 'forgot password' emails
setting.siteVerifyAccountEmailAddressEmailTempla: Verify Account Email Address Email Template
This setting defines the site based e-mail template that is going to be sent for account email addresses getting validated
setting.skuAllowBackorderFlag_hint: Indicate whether this product can be backordered
setting.skuAllowPreorderFlag_hint: Indicate whether this product can be preordered
setting.skuCurrency_hint: Skus can be sold in multiple currencies, however this setting dictates the currency that is stored as the primary price.
setting.skuEligibleCurrencies_hint: This defines the active currencies that a sku is avalable for sale in.
setting.skuHoldBackQuantity_hint: Qty. To Hold Back From ATS (Available To Sell) Calculations
setting.skuOrderMaximumQuantity_hint: Maximum per SKU Qty. allowed on order
setting.skuOrderMinimumQuantity_hint: Minimum per SKU Qty. allowed on order
setting.skuQATSIncludesQNROROFlag_hint: By setting this to 'yes' any quantity not yet received on 'Open Return Orders' will be included in the Quantity Available To Sell
setting.skuQATSIncludesQNROSAFlag_hint: By setting this to 'yes' any quantity not yet received on 'Open Stock Adjustments' will be included in the Quantity Available To Sell
setting.skuQATSIncludesQNROVOFlag_hint: By setting this to 'yes' any quantity not yet received on 'Open Vendor Orders' will be included in the Quantity Available To Sell
setting.skuShippingWeight_hint: Shipping weight of a single Qty. of a SKU
setting.skuTrackInventoryFlag_hint: Select this if you would like the system to track inventory at this level.
setting.subscriptionUsageAutoRetryPaymentDays_hi: This is a comma seperated list that will try to automatically re-charge the payment on a renewal order every x,y,z days.
setting.subscriptionUsageRenewalReminderDays_hin: Comma seperated list of when you would like emails to go-out before a subscription expires
setting.taskFailureEmailTemplate_hint: This email template will be used to send out failure notifications in the event that a task does not run successfully
setting.taskSuccessEmailTemplate_hint: This email template will be used to send out success notifications in the event that a task runs successfully.
